business_info.description: Premium coffee house serving artisan coffee, fresh meals, and pastries

products.name: Cappuccino
products.description: Rich espresso with steamed milk and foam, made from premium Kenyan beans

products.name: Americano
products.description: Bold espresso with hot water, perfect for coffee purists

products.description: Full English breakfast with eggs, bacon, sausages, beans, and toast

products.description: Grilled chicken breast with romaine lettuce, parmesan, and Caesar dressing

products.name: Chocolate Croissant
products.description: Buttery croissant filled with premium Belgian chocolate

products.name: Fresh Orange Juice
products.description: Freshly squeezed orange juice, no added sugar

services.name: Private Event Hosting

documents.about: Java House is Kenya's leading coffee house chain, committed to serving the finest coffee and fresh food in a welcoming environment. Our Westlands branch offers a premium dining experience with artisan coffee, fresh meals, and exceptional service.
documents.return_policy: We stand behind the quality of our food and beverages. If you're not completely satisfied with your order, please speak to our manager immediately. We'll gladly replace your item or provide a full refund.
documents.delivery_policy: We offer delivery within a 5km radius of our Westlands location. Minimum order value is KES 500. Delivery fee is KES 200. Orders are typically delivered within 30-45 minutes during peak hours.
documents.payment_policy: We accept cash, M-Pesa, card payments, and mobile banking. Corporate accounts are available for regular business customers with monthly billing options.

faqs.question: Do you have WiFi?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer complimentary high-speed WiFi to all customers. The network name is 'JavaHouse_Guest' and the password is available from our staff.

faqs.question: Can I work from here with my laptop?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We welcome remote workers and students. We have power outlets at most tables and a quiet atmosphere perfect for productivity.

faqs.question: Do you have vegan options?
faqs.answer: Yes, we have several vegan options including plant-based milk for coffee, vegan pastries, salads, and sandwiches. Please ask our staff for recommendations.

faqs.question: Can I make reservations?
faqs.answer: We don't take reservations for regular dining, but we do accept bookings for private events and large groups (8+ people). Contact us in advance to arrange.

faqs.question: Do you sell coffee beans?
faqs.answer: Yes! We sell our premium coffee beans by the bag. Choose from our signature blends or single-origin varieties. Perfect for brewing Java House quality coffee at home.
